batch_info.name: L5_Academic_Batch2_Expanded
batch_info.description: L5 학술 영어 마스터리 - 2차 배치 확장 (S13-S24, 총 600문장)
batch_info.academic_focus: Advanced academic discourse and research methodology

Peer review is central to qualitative assessment in academic contexts within research frameworks.
Peer review is central to qualitative assessment within research frameworks within research frameworks.
Peer review is central to qualitative assessment within research frameworks within research frameworks.
Peer review is central to qualitative assessment in academic contexts within research frameworks.
